Package view

Interface IView

All Known Implementing Classes:
JFrameView
public interface IView
This is the interface for the GUI view. All the output to be shown in the GUI including making the JFame and showing pop-ups everything will be done in this class.

  • Method Details

    • addFeatures

      void addFeatures(Features features)
      This method is used to set the action listeners of the buttons and call the corresponding methods in Controller which are in Features interface.
      Parameters:
      features - Object of Features interface which consists of all the features our GUI provides.

    • showOutput

      void showOutput(String message)
      This method displays the message as an output dialog box.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be displayed.

    • createPortfolioInput

      ArrayList<String> createPortfolioInput() throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to take inputs from the user using input dialog box required for create, buy and sell portfolio methods.
      Returns:
      an output array consisting of all the inputs taken from the user, so it can be fetched from the controller.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input fields are blank

    • getInput

      ArrayList<String> getInput() throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to take inputs from the user using input dialog box required for getValue, getCostBasis and getComposition methods.
      Returns:
      an output array consisting of all the inputs taken from the user, so it can be fetched from the controller.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input fields are blank

    • getInputForPerformance

      ArrayList<String> getInputForPerformance() throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to take inputs from the user using input dialog box required for getPortfolioPerformance method.
      Returns:
      an output array consisting of all the inputs taken from the user, so it can be fetched from the controller.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input fields are blank

    • getInvestmentDetails

      ArrayList<String> getInvestmentDetails() throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to take inputs from the user using input dialog box required for investInPortfolio method.
      Returns:
      an output array consisting of all the inputs taken from the user, so it can be fetched from the controller.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input fields are blank

    • getInvestmentShares

      Map<String,Double> getInvestmentShares(int num) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This function take number of stocks as a parameter and takes input of that many stock's ticker and percentage proportion to be invested.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of stocks you want to invest in.
      Returns:
      a map consisting of tickers of stocks and their percentage proportion.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the fields are blank.

    • getDollarCostDetails

      ArrayList<String> getDollarCostDetails() throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used to take inputs from the user using input dialog box required for finding dollar cost.
      Returns:
      an output array consisting of all the inputs taken from the user, so it can be fetched from the controller.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input fields are blank

    • showBlank

      void showBlank()
      This method displays appropriate message in form of output dialog box if fields are blank.

    • showChart

      void showChart(Map<String,Double> m, String pName, String sDate, String eDate)
      This method shows the performance of a portfolio in form of a bar chart.
      Parameters:
      m - map consisting of dates and value of portfolio at that date.
      pName - the name of portfolio.
      sDate - the start date from which you want to check performance.
      eDate - the end date till which you want to check performance.
